select symbol, avg(volume) from stocks where year(date) = 2016 group by symbol
""").explain

== Physical Plan ==
*HashAggregate(keys=[symbol#142], functions=[avg(volume#140)])
+- Exchange hashpartitioning(symbol#142, 200)

      +- *Project [volume#140, symbol#142]
         +- *Filter (year(cast(date#135 as date)) = 2016)
            +- InMemoryTableScan [volume#140, symbol#142, date#135], [(year(cast(date#135 as date)) = 2016)]

                        +- *FileScan csv [date#135,open#136,high#137,low#138,close#139,volume#140,adjclose#141,symbol#142] Batched: false, Format: CSV, Location: InMemoryFileIndex[hdfs://quickstart.cloudera:8020/user/cloudera/stocks], PartitionFilters: [], PushedFilters: [], ReadSchema: struct<date:timestamp,open:double,high:double,low:double,close:double,volume:double,adjclose:doub...

paragraphs.text:
val stocks = stocksRaw
.as[String]
.filter(!_.startsWith("date"))
.map{v => 
    val tokens = v.split(",")
    Stock(
        tokens(0),
        tokens(1).toDouble,
        tokens(2).toDouble,
        tokens(3).toDouble,
        tokens(4).toDouble,
        tokens(5).toDouble,
        tokens(6).toDouble,
        tokens(7)
        )
}
